languages.text: "Разве что вас хотят подставить, или дело в еще более запутанных мотивах".
"Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."
languages.original_text: "Разве что вас хотят подставить, или дело в еще более запутанных мотивах".

traits.locale_text: "Unless someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

languages.text: «Tal vez alguien pretenda inculparl{mf|e|a}... o tal vez haya motivos aún más enrevesados tras todo esto».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez alguien pretenda inculparl{mf|e|a}... o tal vez haya motivos aún más enrevesados tras todo esto».

languages.text: “或许确实有人打算把这件事情栽赃到你身上，或许存在某种更加复杂的动机。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

traits.locale_text: “或许确实有人打算把这件事情栽赃到你身上，或许存在某种更加复杂的动机。”

languages.text: 「もしかしたら、誰かがあなたを陥れようとしているのか、それとももっと複雑な動機が絡んでいるのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

traits.locale_text: 「もしかしたら、誰かがあなたを陥れようとしているのか、それとももっと複雑な動機が絡んでいるのかもしれません」

languages.text: « Vous êtes peut-être victime d'un coup monté... à moins que les mobiles d'une telle opération soient encore plus obscurs. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes peut-être victime d'un coup monté... à moins que les mobiles d'une telle opération soient encore plus obscurs. »

languages.text: "Belki birileri size komplo kurmaya çalışıyordur ya da işin içinde çok daha karmaşık gerekçeler vardır."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

traits.locale_text: "Belki birileri size komplo kurmaya çalışıyordur ya da işin içinde çok daha karmaşık gerekçeler vardır."

languages.text: "Vielleicht will Euch jemand reinlegen, oder es sind komplexere Motive im Spiel."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps someone is trying to frame you, or there are even more convoluted motives involved."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht will Euch jemand reinlegen, oder es sind komplexere Motive im Spiel."
